label.setZoomLevel: Take over the zoom level of the map
label.heading: Heading
label.sharedWith: Type a new email and press enter
label.drawToolDescription: Draw on the map, download the drawn data as a file and then import it to your story.

dashboardView.title: Data Narrator
dashboardView.subtitle: Find and create datastories for Hamburg!
dashboardView.description: With the Urban Data Narrator (DaNa), datastories can be read, created and shared on the basis of the Hamburg geoportal. The datastories tell stories about very different topics and places in Hamburg. Selected data from the Hamburg geoportal is combined with texts, photos and illustrations. In this way, you can share your view of urban development topics with the help of data. DaNa is a project of the City Science Lab at HafenCity University Hamburg and is being implemented as part of the Connected Urban Twins project.

success.storyShared: Story URL was copied into buffer.

warning.mapMoved: Some values do not match the current map view.
warning.sendNoSteps: Submitting a story is only possible once at least one step / chapter has been added.
warning.sendNoHTML: Submitting a step is only possible if you have added content.
warning.storyNotSaved: Your story could not be saved.
warning.noIntervalOnScrolly: Scrollable stories can't have an autoplay interval.
warning.noStepInChapter: There needs to be at least one step in a chapter.

error.chapterNumberAlreadyExists: A chapter with this number already exists. Please try out a different number.
error.stepNumberAlreadyExists: A step with this number already exists. Please try out a different number.
error.errorAddingImage: The image couldn't be loaded. Please try another file.

closeStoryCreation.title: Close Tool
closeStoryCreation.description: Are you sure you want to close this tool? Entered data won't be saved.

deleteStep.title: Delete
deleteStep.description: Are you sure you want to delete this step? This can't be undone.

deleteStory.title: Delete
deleteStory.description: Are you sure you want to delete this story? This can't be undone.
